skill.name: rotate
skill.description: Rotate the mobile robot to a desired orientation.

states.name: starting
states.action: Prepare the system to begin rotating the robot.

states.name: execute
states.action: Get the actual orientation of the robot and set the angular velocity to achieve the desired orientation. The angular velocity is maintained until the desired orientation is reached and then set to zero to stop the mobile robot.

states.name: stopping
states.action: Set the velocity of the robot to zero.

states.name: resetting
states.action: Shut down processes used to rotate the robot.
